remarks: Tuple-wise left inverse in groups.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 5-Sep-2015.)
statement:
grpvlinv.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
grpvlinv.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
grpvlinv.n $e |- N = ( invg ` G ) $.
grpvlinv.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
grpvlinv $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ X e. ( B ^m I ) ) -> ( ( N o. X ) oF .+ X ) = ( I X. { .0. } ) ) $.
